about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a software engineer passionate about creating elegant solutions to complex problems. With expertise in modern web technologies, I focus on building scalable applications that deliver exceptional user experiences.
about.paragraph2: My expertise spans from user research and interface design to modern development with Go, Angular, and cloud infrastructure. I'm passionate about anime, gaming, and bringing a kawaii aesthetic to professional work.
about.paragraph3: Based in California, originally from Mexico, I bring a unique perspective to technology and design, always focusing on creating solutions that truly matter to users.
